name: 7 Blades
description:
7 Blades is an action-adventure game developed by Konami Computer Entertainment Japan. It was originally released in 2000. It was published by Konami. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
7 Blades is available on PlayStation 2.
Atsushi Horigami produced the game. It was directed by Kaizo Hayashi.
